import react from 'react'; const Experience = () => { return (

My Work Experience

I am a highly motivated and skilled software developer with a passion for problem solving and a track record of success in the retail and education industries. I have over 3 years of experience in retail, where I honed my ability to work well under pressure and communicate effectively with clients and colleagues. I have also spent over a year working in education, where I have been teaching students software development and computer science concepts.

I am a driven individual who is always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow. I have a strong foundation in computer science, and am skilled in a variety of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++. I am also experienced in using software development tools such as Git, and am familiar with various development methodologies such as Agile.

I am dedicated to delivering high-quality work, and I am always willing to go the extra mile to ensure that projects are completed on time and to the highest standards. I am a strong team player, and I am able to work well both independently and as part of a team.

As I am seeking for new opportunities to grow and develop my skills further, I am open to new challenges and am eager to bring my skills and experience to a new organization. I am confident that my combination of technical skills, industry experience, and passion for problem solving will make me a valuable asset to any team.

Mentor-Software Development

Fullstack Academy of code - Jan/2022 - Present

Teach PERN stacks, Agile Methodologies, object-oriented programming concepts to 40+ student software engineers.

Provide the students with the resources that they need to complete their projects as well as daily code reviews.

Debug and problem-solve student's code while guiding students to the intended solution.{' '}

Warehouse Operator

The TJX Companies, Inc. - Jun/2017 - March/2021

Support warehouse operation workflows by receiving and shipping, loading, and unloading goods, and transferring completed products and raw materials to designated storage areas.

Provide training to new employees in forklift operations to help them obtain certification.



); }; export default Experience;
